title: Normal Mode Draft Pick Suggestion
body:
Hi
As the title suggests. I would like to propose that you make a normal mode draft pick option.
we had that in the UK and I much preferred it. it makes choosing your position better and gets you ready for ranked with picks and bans. also stops the mirror matches which I don't really like.

will there be any consideration for this mode? it would make the game much more enjoyable for myself and I'm sure many other players who like the draft pick but hate the seriousness of ranked games. (currently playing ranked just so I can use this mode

replies.body: I hear you that Normal Draft pick can be cool, I personally prefer it over blind. That said when we did have Normal Draft on we didn't see the numbers we needed to ensure that it was a good experience. It is something we consider and it comes up at every evaluation meeting, unfortunately it's all about the numbers and OCE isn't at a place where we can support it yet.

>we did have Normal Draft on we didn't see the numbers we needed to ensure that it was a good experience.

At least i didn't get 30 minute queues in Draft, TB gave me a 30 minute queue before i gave up.
Why not try and introduce the normal draft pick as a temporary game mode and get feedbacks from there to see if we do have enough players to sustain it.

Great Idea.
I have always preferred this mode over blind pick.

You could try removing Normals Blind pick and Team Builder and just replacing them both Normals Draft Pick? And to tackle the argument of Newer players not knowing how to do draft pick, have a short tutorial? Or have help messages on the screen during the draft pick? You could also prolong the duration of the pick and ban phase so newer players will have time not only look at messages on screen but also to think about their picks and bans

The problem is OCE has a small number of players.

Whilst the Oceanic server has been open for over a year now it is still a relatively new server compared to other regions. I've spoken to Riot over a number of matters and the general response has always been about a lack of player base to sustain X. In this case X would be normal draft pick. Interestingly enough, I believe normal draft pick would be chosen more over blind pick. But the one thing blind pick has over draft pick is the fact that you don't require 16 champions to do blind. Draft pick would make it harder for lower players and/or new players to get a game when the majority of normal players would probably switch to playing draft pick to avoid the troubles that come with normal pick. As I said at the beginning. The major reason for not having normal draft pick here is the fact that Oceania is a relatively new server comparatively and the player base is smaller than other regions. The current queues are already strained enough at match making, especially at higher elo. Adding one more queue to split the player pool even more would just make that strain even bigger. Once the server gets a larger player base I'm sure Riot will re-instate the normal draft pick.
